channel.title: github on Brice Dutheil
channel.description: Recent content in github on Brice Dutheil

item.title: Switching from Disqus to Giscus (GitHub Discussions)
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: In the story of this blog I used WordPress, and using the WordPress comments then moved to Discus as it was better at handling spam. Then I switched this blog to GitHub with first Jekyll with markdown then finally to Hugo, this worked well enough.

item.title: Migrating From Jekyll to Hugo, deploying with Github Pages
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: Moving away form Jekyll. Import is easy, but tackling important details (conserve links to article, conserve comments, migrate some jekyll liquid template, theme tweaking deployment) has been challenging sometime.

item.title: JAX-RS 2.0 pagination with Link header
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: Your REST API is looking good, everything is ready, but here comes a paginated resource. There could be various reasons to do it, be it search, listing, etc. In this matter several choices to implement that appear :
